text: (ki azaab se bachae) aur ye kuphphaar khuda kee jitanee qasamen unake imakaan mein tumhen kha (kar kahate) hain ki jo shakhsh mar jaata hai phir usako khuda dobaara zinda nahin karega (ai rasool) tum kah do ki haan zarur aisa karega is par apane vaayade kee (vapha) laazim va zaruree hai magar bahutere aadamee nahin jaanate hain
